pages.text: One night, a tiny star named Twinkle tumbled right out of the sky. She landed softly on a big, green leaf, her light flickering with fright.

pages.description: Help Twinkle find her friends! Match each constellation to its correct shape.

pages.text: With all her friends found, they shone their light together, creating a beautiful ladder back to the sky. Twinkle waved goodbye and promised to shine extra bright.
